resources.string: This module is made by YukiHookAPI. Learn more https://github.com/HighCapable/YuKiHookAPI
Double-tap on empty space to lock the screen
The module isn\'t enabled. Please check the LSPosed version and module activation information and try again.
The module isn\'t enabled. Please enable the module in the Module settings page.
Lack of root privileges can prevent some features from working properly.
Are you sure you want to reboot the system?
Are you sure you want to reboot all scope apps?
Are you sure you want to reboot the System UI?
Are you sure you want to reboot the System launcher?
Are you sure you want to reboot the %s?
Reboot failed! Please grant root permission to this app and try again.
All target apps have been restarted
This app is made by HyperX Compose
HyperX Compose is a shared Compose UI library for Android based on Miuix
This app is made by Miuix
Miuix is a shared UI library for Compose Multiplatform
This app is made by YukiHookAPI
Join the Telegram channel to give feedback and get internal updates.

Using caches reduces the negative impact on performance but generates a cache file in the host app directory. When this feature is turned off, the cache file will be cleared the next time the host app starts (if it exists).
Takes effect after restarting the app
Opacity of tinted colors in Light mode
Opacity of tinted colors in Dark mode
Opacity should be an integer between 0 and 100, with 0 being the value that represents the highest transparency.
The app will automatically switch to a dual-panel layout on large-screen devices or landscape screens
Resetting all preferences is an irreversible operation, please make sure you have a backup. \nDo you want to continue?
All preferences have been exported to the specified file.
Preferences have been restored from the file.
Restore failed. Please check the backup file.
All preferences have been restored to default settings.
Customize the maximum number of notifications to display
Maximum number of status bar notification icons

The Smart dark feature makes the status bar ignore the colors specified by the app and allows the sampling of the area to change color automatically when in Dark mode. Disable this feature to restore the default behavior of Android.
Hide unlock request at the bottom of the screen
Hide Do Not Disturb mode resident notifications
Notifications will always be displayed on the Lock screen until they\'re manually dismissed.
Disable long press to access Lock screen editor
You can edit the Lock screen in Settings > Personalization
Automatically turn on the flashlight when opening the flashlight adjustment interface from the Lock screen shortcut.
When you open the notification settings, it navigates to the corresponding notification channel settings instead of the app notification settings.
Show pop-up when opening notification settings
Use the pop-up window to choose whether to turn on the app notification settings or the notification channel settings
Allow most notifications to open in a small window
Pull down notifications to open small windows. Some notifications pushed via Mi Push may not be supported.
Fix clock color anomaly in animation
Fix color anomaly in clock dropdown animation when using theme
Force enable the transition animation of the clock
Allow clock transition animation in landscape
Allow Advanced textures to be enabled when using themes
Customize the style of the media control
It\'s highly recommended to use an Overlay (RRO) to modify the notification expansion behavior
Auto-expand the first notification if it\'s ungrouped
Replace the expand button of Android-style notifications with Miuix button
Hide carrier label for SIM card 1
Hide carrier label for SIM card 2
Hide the HD icon next to the carrier label
Always display the battery percentage in the control center, regardless of the battery indicator style preference.

Enabling \"Always show battery percentage\" might subtly affect the visual transition of shared elements when you open the control center. While this effect is often hard to notice, you can enable this option if it bothers you.
Customize theme colors instead of fetching colors from system wallpaper
This color will affect all apps that use dynamic color schemes
New interactive experiences at the cost of performance and power consumption

!!EXPERIMENTAL FEATURES!!

This feature refactors the launcher based on Advanced textures, please make sure your device supports Advanced textures.

If you turn it on, you will be exposed to risks including, but not limited to, power consumption, frame drops, jank, and even crashes.

Make sure you aren't using a modified launcher and have disabled any other modules related to launcher blurring and animation.
Perform haptic feedback on the start and release of swipes
In the back gesture, a long swipe will trigger a specific function.
Long press on the full screen indicator
Long press on the full screen indicator to trigger a specific function.
Double tap on the full screen indicator
Double tap on the full screen indicator to trigger a specific function.
Optimize the animation of the icon when unlocking
Synchronize wallpaper zoom with app launch
Prevents a situation where the app isn\'t launched but the wallpaper is zoomed. Will make the app launch look slower and isn\'t recommended to be enabled.
Disable zoom animation on icon click
Disable dim animation on icon click
Disable zoom animation on folder click
Disable dim animation when clicking on icon in folder
Adaptive icon size in large folders
When a large folder (3x3 or 2x2) is just filled with icons (number of 9 or 4), the last icon is also a large icon.
Utilizes the entire folder view width
Number of columns of icons in the folder
Lower the priority will lower the priority of using the app\'s own icons
Uniform corner radius for large icons
Capsule shape icons will become rounded rectangle icons
Modify card animation when dismissing recent tasks
Hide the status bar in Recents
Long click on memory info to clear all
Stop reducing the brightness of wallpaper
Stop the automatic reduction of the wallpaper\'s brightness when entering the recent tasks view
Holding time for calling out the dock
Values greater than 1000 milliseconds are not recommended
Height threshold for calling out the dock
The dock will only be called out if the height of the slide is less than this threshold
Add startup animation to all widgets
Remove the icon limit from the dock
Always show time in status bar
Remove model restrictions on some features
Hide the fake full screen indicator
Hide the fake full screen indicator on the horizontal Recents screen
Specify widget and app label color (ignore wallpaper color)
Status bar text and icon color
Specify the color of the status bar text and icons (ignore wallpaper color). Requires enabling \"Disable Smart dark\" on the System UI page.
Specify the color of the status bar text and icons for the Personal assistant (ignore wallpaper color). Requires enabling \"Disable Smart dark\" on the System UI page.

Most of the features on this page are designed for users located in Chinese mainland.\nPlease note that music-related features are exclusive to users with music membership accounts.\nWe recommend using the app versions below, which have been tested and verified for compatibility.
It should also disable ads on the Home screen (no guarantees)
Block uploading of installed apps list
Block uploading of information about the app when it\'s installed
Remove app recommendations from search box suggestions
Hide the top bar of the start page
Hide the top bar of the simplified start page, which includes settings and mode toggle buttons.
Hide the AI search entry above the keyboard on the search page
Remove the \"Report\" button from the uninstall app pop-up window
Block the dialog that prompts you to turn on update push, when update push is turned off and the update button is clicked.
Hide the app security card on my page
Force enable blur effect on bottom tab bar
Filter out all tabs not shown below
Warning: there are currently fewer than two visible tabs, which may cause UI abnormalities!
Remove the karaoke from the top tab on the home page
Remove the long audio from the top tab on the home page
Remove the discover from the top tab on the home page
Hide the banner on my page
Hide recommended songs on my page
Hide favorite counts shown on favorite icons. May affect performance.
Ignore the system app installation restrictions by disguising the installation source as a system app.
Package name of the install source
Lock the security score to 100 and disable the \"Optimize\" button
Hide the red alert dots on Home screen grid icons
Hide the recommend function banner below the function grid
Hide popular function recommendations at the bottom of the page
Remove the \"Report\" button from the app info page
The changes take effect immediately, but will be lost after rebooting the system.
The value should be greater than or equal to 0.5 and less than 2.5
Unable to check/modify the current font scale value. Please ensure that the entered value is within the valid range and that root privileges have been granted.
Modify the actual scale values for the seven font size options in Settings

Modify appropriate font size option based on their range and your intended value, then select the corresponding option in Settings. 

Ensure all options have unique values in ascending order. 

Options like "170", "200", or those with values above 1.55 may be recognized by the system as large font sizes and could affect layout.
The values aren\'t in ascending order
The value should be greater than or equal to %1$.2f and less than %2$.2f
Allow all apps to be in small window mode
Ignore system blacklists and software\'s own disabling of small windows
Modify the maximum number of floating to 255 to allow more floating windows to be open at the same time.
Allow multiple instances of the same app
Controls whether rotation suggestions are displayed
Currently disabled. Are you sure you want to enable it?
Currently enabled. Are you sure you want to disable it?
Failed! Please grant root permission to this app and try again.
Affects the wallpaper zoom animation when launching/exiting apps on the desktop
Disable whitelisting of forced Dark mode
Make it possible to enable the Forced dark mode feature for most apps, except for system apps, etc.
Skip the wait time on warnings
Skip wait times when using USB debugging, unknown sources, and accessibility.
Remove \"Allow XXX to open XXX\" chain start pop-up
Show screen usage in power consumption ranking
Battery usage of apps that are hidden by default will also be shown
Show Android System in power consumption ranking
Allow management Wi-Fi permissions for system apps
Tap the icon in the app info to launch the app
Prevents the system from removing the auto-start permission from apps
Use toast to show clipboard read prompts
Using toast allows the element behind the prompt to be clickable
Unlock Apps using high refresh rate
Prevent recovery of battery optimization whitelist
Remove restrictions on GMS background running
Disguised as an international version of the system, it allows GMS to run in the background, preventing the FCM connection from being interrupted after locking the screen.
Open the battery optimization page that is hidden by default
Failed to open, probably not supported by the system.
Forces debug mode to be enabled. Only works with older versions of browsers.
Use the pre-release environment. It may be possible to remove some of the ads. It may not be possible to use settings such as customized search engine, so please finish setting before turning it on!
Recognize images in \"Pictures/Screenshots\" as screenshots and videos in \"Movies/ScreenRecorder\" as screen recordings, and display them in the corresponding albums.
All apps can be opened on another device
Allow more apps to be transferred

Some apps still cannot be opened on other devices due to the built-in whitelist. To transfer more apps, enable this feature. It requires the generation of a cache file in the host app\'s directory, which may cause a delay if the cache is unavailable. Additionally, the receiving device will also need to have this app installed and this feature enabled.
Allow any non-system channel to install system apps
Add Bing and Google to Search Engine Options
The URL must contain \"{searchTerms}\" as a placeholder for the search keyword
Leave blank if there are no special circumstances
Grant the \"Display over other apps\" permission
Go directly to the switch that grants this permission to a specific app, instead of the list of apps associated with this permission.
Only VAB devices are supported, don\'t turn it on for non-VAB devices!
The cards will switch the background color according to the sunrise and sunset by default. Force light/dark to keep the card background constant.
Activating the set of figures where numbers are all of the same size, allowing them to be easily aligned like in tables.
Valid only when using the 12-hour clock format
Recommended to be turned on when using the 24-hour clock format
It will also enable the status bar to refresh every second
Fixed the width of TextView so that the notification icons don\'t keep changing position when the clock displays seconds.
Please use variable fonts. Only works for the targets enabled below.
Font weight of battery percentage symbol
Font weight of mobile network type
Strongly recommend that don\'t hide it!

Starting from HyperOS 2.0.200, users can control the display of status bar icons on the \"Customize toggle display\" page in Settings. However, this feature conflicts with the settings on this page, causing unexpected behavior. Therefore, it\'s strongly recommended to enable the \"Ignore system settings\" option below and manage all status bar icons directly on this page.
Ignore the system setting for \"Customize toggle display\"
Hide the mobile network icon for SIM card 1
Hide the mobile network icon for SIM card 2
Hide the small HD call icon
Hide the large HD call icon
Hide HD call no service icon
Swap the battery icon and battery percentage
Customize the padding of the battery icon
Make the battery percentage symbol the same text size as the number
(When the value is 0 it will not change the battery percentage text size)
Swap mobile network icon and Wi-Fi icon
Experimental feature. Use transition animation when changing text color.
Custom buttons on the right side
Play button on the far left
Hide the elapsed time and total time next to the progress bar
Hide the device switch button at the top right of the media control
Prevent action buttons from being scaled
The system will forcefully scale down custom action buttons, which may cause problems. However, preventing the system from scaling may cause the buttons to appear larger.
Ensure that the thumb is fully visible when it\'s at either end of the progress bar

Since Advanced textures have been set as the default background for media controls, the corresponding option has been removed. If you need to adjust the effects of Advanced textures, use a Magisk module or the system theme to modify the blur parameters.
The larger the value, the better the blurring effect, but it also consumes more performance.
Layer an additional black mask on top of the blur layer
Opacity of the mask used for dimming
Set 0 for transparent, set 255 for black.
The larger the value the greater the initial rate of change of the animation
Try to be compatible with other modules, but compatibility cannot be ensured. Not recommended to be enabled.
Try enabling wallpaper scaling when it appears abnormal
Forces an animation to be added to avoid blurring not appearing in time on fast swipes. Enable this only if you notice this problem.
Additional fixes for small window animations
Force an animation to be added to avoid flickering when dragging the app into a small window, not sure if this has a negative impact for now. Only enable this if you mind this a lot.
Used to blur the application. Blurring occurs when launching an app, closing an app, and when in the recent tasks view.
Used to blur the background when opening a folder
Used to blur the wallpaper. Blurring occurs while in edit mode.
Use blur effect for app drawer background
Blur wallpaper when opening app drawer
Controls the launcher view behind the recent tasks view.
Show launcher view when in the recent tasks view.
Show launcher view when opening a folder.
Don\'t hide the launcher view when going to the Personal assistant
Don\'t hide the launcher view when in the recent tasks view
Affects launcher view scaling in recent tasks view
Blur effect of Personal assistant background
Used to blur the entire launcher view. Blurring occurs when in the Personal assistant.
Make the Personal assistant hover above the launcher
Don\'t hide the launcher view when going to the Personal assistant
